text: 5.4 Mat 15.4, Epe 6.1-2, 1 Ti 2.3 Pen bin kaŋɨl olap ñapay ñɨ apɨs ne ogɨnap yenɨgel, kɨlop yomɨl agenɨmɨn, kɨli nop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgel. Wog anɨb ak wog awl yɨbɨl, God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ne sɨŋak. Wog kɨli ned adek ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, nonɨm nap akaŋ, napɨs nased okok kɨlop yɨmagɨlɨlak tek, pen kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgel. Anɨgenɨgabal, God nop tep gɨnɨgab.
